Docs.param: The CoreGraphics font to register with the CoreText font system.
On return the error, if any.
Docs.returns: True on success, false on error.

remarks.para: You can use this feature to register fonts that you download from the network, or to use fonts that are for example embedded as a resource in your executable or some other database.
